# IntelliJ - Pig Plugin Pig Plugin adds [Apache Pig](http://pig.apache.org/) Language support to [IntelliJ](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/).
# Features * Keyword highlighting * Code commenting/uncommenting * Brace matching * Syntax and errors highlighting
# Installation Select the pig-plugin.jar from the plugin manager or install from the IntelliJ plugin repo.
## Donations If you would like to make a donation you can use [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=T2DA32ERZGGXL&lc=US&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted).
